abstract: Pizza night on “Hell’s Kitchen” and the start of Neil Diamond week on “American Idol” lifted Fox to No. 1 in the ratings on Tuesday. According to Nielsen’s estimates, 24.4 million viewers tuned in to watch the five remaining “Idol” contestants square off at 8 p.m. Following it, Fox’s “Hell’s Kitchen” delivered 12.3 million viewers, the largest audience ever in the series’ three-year history.
lead_paragraph: Pizza night on “Hell’s Kitchen” and the start of Neil Diamond week on “American Idol” lifted Fox to No. 1 in the ratings on Tuesday. According to Nielsen’s estimates, 24.4 million viewers tuned in to watch the five remaining “Idol” contestants square off at 8 p.m. Following it, Fox’s “Hell’s Kitchen” delivered 12.3 million viewers, the largest audience ever in the series’ three-year history.

headline.main: Tuesday Night Was All About Fox
